settings.hamburger_button_styles: bg-white p-2 inline-flex items-center justify-center focus:outline-none
settings.navbar_dropdown_classes: absolute z-10 -ml-5 mt-5 transform px-2 w-screen max-w-md sm:px-0 lg:ml-0 lg:left-1/2 lg:-translate-x-1/2
settings.dropdown_content_classes: shadow-lg border ring-black ring-opacity-5 overflow-hidden rounded-lg
settings.dropdown_inner_classes: relative grid gap-6 bg-white px-5 py-6 sm:gap-8 sm:p-8
settings.dropdown_link_classes: -m-3 p-3 flex items start rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-100
settings.utility_menu_classes: hidden md:flex items-center justify-end md:flex-1 space-x-5
settings.mobile_menu_classes: absolute z-10 top-0 inset-x-0 p-2 transform origin-top-left md:hidden
settings.mobile_menu_content_classes: shadow-lg rounded-lg ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5 bg-white w-full
settings.mobile_menu_dropdown_button_classes: text-base text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 flex items-center justify-between w-full
settings.mobile_menu_dropdown_inner_classes: -m-3 p-3 mt-2 flex items-center rounded-md text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-50

settings.navbar_classes: h-[48px] md:h-[56px] lg:[83px] w-full z-10 bg-white
settings.container_classes: border-y-[1px] lg:border-x-[1px] border-brand-black flex justify-between h-full
settings.navbar__menu_left: hidden lg:flex h-full w-1/2 justify-start pl-[1px]
settings.navbar__menu_right: hidden lg:flex h-full w-1/2 justify-end pr-[1px]
settings.left_menu_item_classes: text-brand-black hover:text-gray-900 border-brand-black border-r-[1px] flex items-center justify-center w-1/4
settings.right_menu_item_classes: text-brand-black hover:text-gray-900 border-brand-black border-l-[1px] flex items-center justify-center w-1/4
settings.menu_button_container_classes: flex items-center justify-center aspect-square border-brand-black border-x lg:hidden
settings.cart_button_classes: flex items-center justify-center aspect-square border-brand-black border-x lg:hidden
settings.menu_overlay_classes: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 z-40 transition-opacity duration-300 ease-in-out opacity-0 pointer-events-none lg:hidden

settings.off_canvas_menu_content_classes: text-mobile-heading-5 md:text-desktop-heading-5 text-brand-black font-medium h-[calc(100%_-_47px)] md:h-[calc(100%_-_55px)] overflow-y-scroll
settings.off_canvas_more_menu: flex flex-col gap-4 border-b border-brand-black font-medium p-6
settings.off_canvas_menu_social: flex border-b border-brand-black font-medium p-6 justify-between

settings.hero-main-richtext: Discover Uniquely Crafted Bouquets and Gifts for Any Occasion: Spread Joy with Our Online Flower Delivery Service
settings.hero__description: Experience the joy of giving with our modern floral studio. Order online and send fresh flowers, plants and gifts today.
